title: Forced Insurance (Bundling)
citation: RBI Master Circular on Customer Service
content: Banks cannot force you to buy insurance, mutual funds, or other products as a condition for getting a loan or a locker.
template: I am being forced to purchase insurance as a condition for my loan/locker. This violates RBI guidelines on bundling and mis-selling. Please process my request without forced products.

title: Locker Loss Compensation
content: The bank is liable for up to 100 times the annual rent if your locker contents are lost due to fire, theft, or building collapse.
template: I am writing to claim compensation for my locker loss as per RBI/2021-22/86. The bank is liable for 100x the annual rent for incidents like fire or theft.

title: Zero Foreclosure Charges
content: Banks and NBFCs cannot charge any penalty for pre-paying floating-rate personal, home, or small business loans taken by individuals.
template: I wish to pre-close my floating-rate loan. As per RBI guidelines, no foreclosure charges or pre-payment penalties can be levied on individual borrowers.

title: Dormant Account Rights
content: Banks cannot charge fees for activating a dormant account. KYC for activation can be done at any branch, not just your home branch.
template: I want to reactivate my dormant account. As per RBI/2023-24/105, there should be no charges for activation and KYC can be done at this branch.

title: Return of Property Docs
content: Banks must return original property documents within 30 days of full loan repayment. Delay beyond 30 days carries a ₹5,000 per day penalty.
template: My loan was closed on [Date]. It has been over 30 days. As per RBI guidelines, I am entitled to my original documents and a compensation of ₹5,000 per day for the delay.

title: ATM Failed Transaction
content: If money is deducted but not dispensed, the bank must credit it within T+5 days. Beyond that, the bank must pay you ₹100 for every day of delay.
template: My ATM transaction on [Date] failed but money was deducted. It has been over 5 days. Please credit the amount plus the ₹100 per day penalty as per RBI rules.

title: Free Look Period
content: You have a right to return an insurance policy within 15 days (30 days for online) if you are not satisfied with the terms.
template: I wish to exercise my right to cancel this policy within the Free Look period as per IRDAI Master Circular 2024. Please refund the premium as per rules.

title: Fast Claim Settlement
content: Insurance companies must pay death claims within 15 days of receiving all documents. Any delay beyond that attracts interest penalty.
template: I have submitted all documents for my claim. As per IRDAI 2024 guidelines, the claim must be settled within 15 days. Please expedite or provide interest for delay.

title: EPF Death Claim (7 Days)
content: EPFO must settle death claims within 7 days. For other claims like withdrawal, the timeline is 20 days.
template: I have applied for a death claim for UAN [UAN Number]. As per EPFO Citizen Charter, this must be settled within 7 days. Please check the status.

title: Investor Rights (SCORES 2.0)
content: Stock brokers/AMCs must resolve your grievance within 21 days. If not, you can escalate directly to SEBI via SCORES 2.0.
template: I have a pending grievance with [Broker/AMC Name]. It has been over 21 days. As per SEBI Investor Charter, I am now escalating this for resolution.

title: Doorstep Banking Rights
content: Banks must provide doorstep services (cash pickup/delivery, KYC) to users over 70 years or with disabilities.
template: I am over 70 years old and wish to avail Doorstep Banking services as per RBI/2017-18/89. Please arrange for cash/document services at my residence.

title: Zero-Balance (BSBDA)
content: Every citizen has a right to a Zero-Balance account with no minimum balance penalty and a free ATM card.
template: I wish to open a Basic Savings Bank Deposit Account (BSBDA). As per RBI directions, this should be a zero-balance account with no hidden maintenance fees.

title: Zero Liability (Fraud)
content: If you report an unauthorized digital transaction within 3 days, your liability is Zero.
template: I am reporting an unauthorized transaction of [Amount] on [Date]. Since I am reporting within 3 days, my liability is zero as per RBI/2017-18/15. Please credit the amount.

title: Mental Health Cover
content: Insurance companies must cover mental illness treatment on par with physical illness.
template: I am filing a claim for mental health treatment. As per IRDAI/HLT/REG/CIR/046, mental illness must be treated on par with physical illness for insurance coverage.

title: AYUSH Treatment Rights
content: You have the right to claim insurance for Ayurveda, Yoga, Unani, Siddha, and Homeopathy treatments.
template: I am filing a claim for AYUSH treatment. As per IRDAI Master Circular 2024, my policy must cover recognized alternative treatments like Ayurveda/Yoga.

title: Billing Cycle Choice
content: You have the right to choose or change your billing cycle once to suit your needs (e.g., your salary date).
template: I wish to change my credit card billing cycle. As per RBI Master Directions on Credit Cards, I have the right to choose a billing cycle that suits my needs.

title: Document Delay Penalty
content: If the bank fails to return property documents within 30 days of loan closure, they must pay you ₹5,000 for every day of delay.
template: My loan was closed on [Date]. It has been over 30 days. As per RBI/2023-24/60, I am entitled to my original documents and a compensation of ₹5,000 per day for the delay.

title: Self-Certification Withdrawal
content: You can withdraw PF for illness, marriage, or education via self-certification without needing an employer signature.
template: I am applying for a PF advance for [Purpose]. As per EPFO 2024 guidelines, I am submitting this via self-certification without the need for employer attestation.

title: NPS Partial Withdrawal
content: You can withdraw up to 25% of your contribution for illness, marriage, or home purchase after 3 years of joining NPS.
template: I wish to partially withdraw from my NPS account for [Purpose]. As per PFRDA 2024 rules, I am entitled to 25% of my own contribution for this purpose.

title: Negative Balance Bar
content: Banks cannot let your savings account balance go into negative due to non-maintenance of minimum balance.
template: My account balance has been shown as negative due to minimum balance charges. This violates RBI guidelines which prohibit negative balances due to such penalties.

title: Death Claim Delay Penalty
content: Banks must pay a monetary penalty to the nominee if they delay settling a death claim beyond 15 days of receiving all documents.
template: I submitted all documents for the death claim of [Account Name] on [Date]. It has been over 15 days. As per RBI 2025 directions, the bank is now liable to pay a penalty for this delay.

title: Early Exit Refund
content: Effective Oct 2024, you get a significantly higher refund if you surrender your policy early (even in the 1st year).
template: I wish to surrender my policy. As per the new IRDAI 2024 norms effective from October 1, 2024, I am entitled to a higher Special Surrender Value.

title: Closure Delay Penalty
content: If the bank doesn't close your credit card within 7 working days of request, they must pay you ₹500 per day until closure.
template: I requested closure of my card on [Date]. It has been over 7 working days. As per RBI Master Directions, the bank is liable to pay ₹500 per day for the delay.

title: Interest on Inoperative A/c
content: Banks must continue to credit interest on your savings account at the regular rate even if it is marked as inoperative or inactive.
template: My account was marked inoperative, but interest has not been credited. As per RBI/2023-24/105, banks must credit interest regularly regardless of account status.

title: 10 Nominees Rule
content: You have the right to name up to 10 nominees (increased from 3) for your Mutual Fund folios and Demat accounts.
template: I wish to add additional nominees to my account. As per SEBI 2025 guidelines, I am entitled to nominate up to 10 individuals for my investments.

title: Term Deposit (Deceased)
content: Banks cannot charge any penalty for premature closure of FDs/RDs if the account holder has passed away.
template: I am requesting premature closure of the FD of the deceased account holder. As per RBI 2025 directions, no penalty can be levied for such closures.

title: UPI Auto-Reversal
content: For failed UPI payments where money is debited, the bank must reverse it in T+1 days or pay ₹100 per day penalty.
template: My UPI transaction on [Date] failed but money was debited. It has been over T+1 days. Please credit the amount plus the ₹100/day penalty as per NPCI rules.

title: Error Correction Penalty
content: If a credit bureau (CIBIL etc.) doesn't fix a wrong entry in 30 days, they must pay you ₹100 per day compensation.
template: I reported an error in my credit report on [Date]. It has been over 30 days and the error remains. As per RBI/2023-24/72, I am entitled to ₹100 per day compensation.

title: Key Fact Statement (KFS)
content: Banks must provide a 1-page summary of ALL charges (including hidden fees) before you sign any loan agreement.
template: I am applying for a loan and request a Key Fact Statement (KFS). As per RBI guidelines of April 2024, I must be provided with a transparent summary of all costs.

title: Written Rejection Reason
content: Banks must provide a specific reason in writing or email if they reject your loan application.
template: My loan application was rejected. As per RBI 2025 guidelines, please provide the specific reasons for rejection in writing for my records.

title: Grace Period Right
content: You have a mandatory grace period of 30 days (15 for monthly) to pay premiums before a policy lapses.
template: I am paying my premium within the mandatory grace period. As per IRDAI Master Circular 2024, my policy should not be treated as lapsed.

title: Wallet Balance Refund
content: You have the right to transfer the remaining balance of a digital wallet to your bank account if you close the wallet.
template: I am closing my digital wallet. As per RBI Master Directions, please transfer the remaining balance of [Amount] to my linked bank account.

title: Direct Plan Right
content: You have the right to invest in Direct Plans of Mutual Funds to avoid paying any distributor commission or brokerage.
template: I wish to switch my investments to a Direct Plan. As per SEBI regulations, all mutual funds must offer a direct plan with lower expense ratios.

title: Free Annual Report
content: You are entitled to one full credit report for free every calendar year from each of the major credit bureaus (CIBIL, Experian, Equifax, CRIF).
template: I am requesting my free annual credit report as per RBI/2023-24/72. Every citizen is entitled to one free report per year from each bureau.
